headline: Welltower’s Record Growth And Senior Housing Focus Test Valuation Optimism
summary: Welltower (NYSE:WELL) reported its strongest year of revenue, EBITDA, and FFO growth in a decade, driven by greater focus on senior housing communities and technology-enabled operations. Management backed this performance with guidance through 2026 and outlined expectations for double-digit growth over that period. The company continued reallocating its portfolio away from outpatient and skilled nursing assets toward higher growth senior housing investments. For investors tracking...
